data.text: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.
Sometimes being a brother is even better than being a superhero
Happy Birthday To My Little Brother Hope your special day is filled with love and happiness and this year is your best year yet
I have many good friends but the best of them is you little brother. Happy Birthday
Growing up with so much fun dear brother
Happy birthday to my soul mate to my partner in crime to my support I love you brother
The one who always backed me up and the one who is my second father.
A friend is a brother who was once a bother
you are my everything bro
Life offers us so many blessings nd a brother is one of them
Enjoy ur birthday big bro May u have a wonderful day You deserve it anyway
May this day give you a new beginning in life. Happy birthday dear brother
The younger brother must help to pay for the pleasures of the elder
Happy Birthday to my big brother who defines magnanimity and generosity
Happy Birthday to the loving brother that has caused mayhem since he was born
To the best man in the wrld is my brother
On your birthday I want to thank you for being the best brother anyone could ever hope for
My brother is my only best friend and No one can replace him
No treasure compares to the love of a brother Wishing you a wonderful birthday
May God bless you with every joy and happiness
Wish you lots of luck, good health and wealth on your birthday. Love you brother
My dear brother, I wish you a very happy and joyful year ahead
May you live a long and beautiful life. Happy birthday bro
Cakes and gifts are nice but having you in the family is the nicest thing God has given us. Have a joyful birthday bro
I wish you a joyful day full of love, smiles and chocolates
